# Collaborators

https://martinschobben.github.io/webpage/index.html

Martin Schobben, DFG research fellow at University of Leeds, UK. Geobiologist working on marine productivity and nutrient cycling during the end-Permian mass extinction. 

http://www.fossilrich.com/

Richard Hofmann, Postdoc at Museum für Naturkunde Berlin, Germany. Palaeontologist interested in fundamental transformations (i.e. mass extinctions, recovery episodes, radiations, and ecological innovation).

https://plannapus.github.io/

Johan Renaudie, Postdoc at Museum für Naturkunde Berlin, Germany. Micropaleontologist studying Cenozoic siliceous plankton and their relationship with past climatic and oceanographic changes.
